casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Stephen NEARY Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 24, 2018

David B. Rozwaski, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Timothy F. Costello, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 177 Conn. App. 871, 173 A.3d 982 (2017), is denied.
